headline.main: RED ARMY DENTING NAZI DEFENSE ZONE; Bryansk-Orel-Kursk Triangle Guarding Ukraine Flank Is Menaced by Wedges

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 2 (AP) -- Red Army tanks, smashing forward on firming ground against a Nazi Army that has not yet been able to get an offensive under way, are driving deeper wedges between the German "hedghog" positions of Bryansk. Orel and Kursk, dispatches from Stockholm said today.
abstract: USSR forces dent German Bryansk-Orel-Kursk line; Kharkov sector active; guerrilla activity continues behind German lines; Kronstadt guns shell Finnish lines; Germans raid USSR lines, Lake Ilmen area
